mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{loginedMemberId}, title = #{title}, `body`= #{body}, boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, IFNULL(SUM(RP.point),0) AS extra__sumReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(RP.point > 0, RP.point, 0)),0) AS extra__goodReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(RP.point < 0, RP.point, 0)),0) AS extra__badReactionPoint FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN reactionPoint AS RP ON RP.relTypeCode = 'article' AND A.id = RP.relId WHERE A.id = #{id} GROUP BY A.id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article WHERE boardId = #{boardId}
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
SELECT hitCount FROM article WHERE id = #{id}
